name: Kung UFO
description:
This is a ENDLESS SPACE SHOOTER so its infinity and progressive dificulty game.

You can play Single, Coop or Versus Mode.

Its still in development, but you can share sugestions in comments.
You start with 3 Lifes, you know when you dying if you are smoking (2 lifes) or leaving particles (1 life)

=====Controls=====

Player 1 - Arrow Keys - Movement | Space or "M" - Shoot

Player 2 - WASD - Movement | "1" or Shift - Shoot

=====PowerUp's=====

Red = Power your DAMAGE

Blue - Power your FIRE RATE

Yellow - Increase your WEAPONS

Green - Gives one LIFE or SAVE your COOP
